ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:59:44 [Issue ID 4000-166359] urn:comicvine:4000-166359 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 07:28:02. [Issue ID 230707]
ComicInfo.Summary: The Iceni is dead. The Druid is alone. Cross-bearing thieves have come for the Necroplasm. On the side, Raven, a beautiful warrior girl, has her sights set on Covenant, convinced he is the legendary Beast of the Black Wood. She will stop at nothing to see Spawn's head on her razor pike. On the other side is a gentle giant who carries a lonely heart and forbidden knowledge. As these disparate elements come together, the Hellspawn stands in the middle, ready to fight for his humanity and his very soul.
ComicInfo.Title: The Beast
